RelatedSentence: HYDERABAD : After a bomb threat call , police conducted a thorough anti-sabotage sweep at the Secunderabad railway station on Monday .
Later , they realized it was a hoax call .
At 2.30 pm , the main police control room received an anonymous phone call saying a bomb was planted on the Secunderabad railway station premises and it could go off at any moment .
